attributes.title: Viruses
attributes.review: This app downloaded 3 viruses on to my phone and I had to pay to get them removed. I wouldn’t recommend downloading this if you want your information kept private.

attributes.title: NEVER GET THIS
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP IVE EVER SEEN!!!! The app took forever to download and when it finally did, it hacked my phone and stole my data. now i have people calling me none stop about racist and homophobic plans to ruin America. I can not believe the president is behind this 🙄

attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD !
attributes.review: it took up all my storage and it was overall i very bad app 🙀✨it  took 6+ hours to download too 🧚 not to mention i no longer have room in my phone to keep great distorted pictures of the president 😸❤️

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: If Obama had this app ... it would be good but since he doesn’t, than it’s garbage. I honestly don’t know how y’all can call a orange Cheeto racist rapist your president like it literally doesn’t come out of my mouth when I try

attributes.title: would not recommend
attributes.review: this app told me that i could not sign up because i was black. they says my vote does not matter because my life doesn’t matter. i tried to give president trump a chance after several allegations, but this too much. the app also took several days to download. i think it is because it has to access all of the information on your phone.

attributes.title: Do not support
attributes.review: This app is so confusing to operate. It loads forever when you open it. It is not helpful in any way and I don’t even know what I was supposed to be able to use it for.

attributes.title: NO NO NO
attributes.review: this app is DISGUSTING 😩😭。this is making me so sad, i opened the app with high hopes and was left crushed! i has all my data delete and all trumps nudes were put onto my phone!😭😭😭✨they had took all my stuff! i am so so sad of what they did to me!🤪😇🤩🤩😇😂😟😒😥🤥😐😐

According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this is was terrible. it took several hours just to download, and when i finally got into the app, nothing wouldn’t work. i would not recommend getting this app.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i just wanted to support the wonderful president but this app took like several hours to download and when i got on it every five seconds an add popped up and it was extremely annoying.
